Episode 42: The Future of AI in Web Development

In this episode, we explore how artificial intelligence is revolutionizing web development. We discuss the latest tools, frameworks, and methodologies that are changing the way developers build applications.

Our guest speaker, Dr. Sarah Johnson, shares insights from her research on AI-assisted coding and the potential impact on the industry.

  • Current tools and frameworks
  • Future predictions and trends
